Visibility: 16 km

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 late this afternoon. High 21. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Showers beginning before morning. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 14.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon then southwest 30. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
